title: Core RD Knitting Co jeans

title: Ewa Larsson kimono
description:
Handcrafted Silk Kimono
Each Garment tells its own story and is one of a kind. Vintage silk scarfs found all over the world are carefully chosen and sewn together in an atelier in Stockholm to create a vibrant patchwork for each unique, eclectic piece.
As the garments are crafted of vintage materials no item is the other one alike and colour variations will occur.
One Size

description:

All models are made in limited quantities varying from 3-20 depending on how much material was able to be sourced  
63% Cotton 37% Polyester

title: Maison Margiela MM6 japanese bag
description:
Maison Margiela MM6 Japanese medium shoulder bag. Crafted from distressed leather, the bag features buttons at its edges that allow for the bag to change form through folding, just like the origami that inspire its silhouette. This version comes in a medium size and is also detailed by button closure on leather detail, an inside pocket with button closure and a welt pocket and clasp at the front. The brand’s distinct signature, a horizontal line of white stitches, is found on the back.
S54WD0039P4792H4524
Body: 100% calf leather
Lining: 100% cotton

Height: 55 cm
Width: 2 cm
Length: 50 cm
Handle drop: 20 cm

Made in Italy

This denim shirt jacket from Dries Van Noten in a wax coated cotton denim is cut to a straight narrow fit. Two breast pockets and center button closure. Two side pockets.
100% cottonMade in Tunisia

title: Dries Van Noten shirt
description:
This garment from Dries Van Noten is a hybrid between a jacket and a shirt. A classic fit shirt with straight cut bottom hem and a zip closure at the center front. Can be worn either as a shirt or a super light weight shirt jacket.
86% cotton 14% polyesterMade in Hungary

title: Dries Van Noten relaxed silk shirt
description:
This silk shirt from Dries Van Noten is cut to a boxy and relaxed fit. It features two cargo pockets on the chest and has rounded side slits for optimal relaxed fit. 
100% silkMade in Hungary

title: Dries Van Noten bomber jacket
description:
A nylon bomber jacket from Dries Van Noten. Cut to a small tight fit to emulate the fit of an olden days flight jacket. Biker jacket sleeves with zipper details at the end. Side pockets and a breast pocket, all with zip closure. 
100% PolyesterMade in Hungary

title: Dries Van Noten suit jacket
description:
A classic fit relaxed tailored linen/cotton suit jacket from Dries Van Noten. Single breasted one button closure. Welted flap pockets and a welted breast pocket. Regular fit.
Can be matched with these trousers for a full suit.
59% linen 41% cottonMade in Morocco

title: Dries Van Noten printed blazer
description:
A printed four buttoned blazer from Dries Van Noten with two welted flap pockets and a welted breast pocket. Relaxed but tailored fit.  
100% ViscoseMade in Morocco

title: Rick Owens denim pods shorts
description:
Rick Owens DRKSHDW creatch cargo denim pod shorts. 4 way denim stretch. Dropped crotch. Cargo pockets.

title: Rick Owens Sphinx jumbo jacket
description:
A big fit jumbo denim jacket from Rick Owens DRKSHDW . The intricate front pattern includes hidden pockets and the jacket has a metall button front closure. Big boxy fit.
100% CottonMade in Italy

title: Rick Owens oversized t-shirt
description:
Rick Owens DRKSHDW's new classic t-shirt fit "Tommy T" here in a Dust color way. Mid weight cotton jersey. 
100% CottonMade in Italy

title: Rick Owens flight vest
description:
An oversized fit flight vest from Rick Owens DRKSHDW in a heavy knit jersey. Rib knit neck edging and bottom edge. Front zip closure. 
100% CottonMade in Italy

title: Rick Owens denim jacket
description:
This take on a classic trucker's denim jacket from Rick Owens DRKSHDW is cut to a snug fit with slim sleeves. Black overdyed 4 way stretch denim coated in an irregular pattern. Front button closure and two breast pockets with distressed flaps. Side pockets.
(Small fit: L = M)
91% cotton 6% elastane 3% rubberMade in Italy

title: Core RD Knitting Co t-shirt
description:
A boxy heavy cotton jersey t-shirt with wide hems along the bottom and the bottom of the sleeves. Rib knit edge along the neck hole and two red seams at the bottom left corner.
100% Cotton

title: Core RD Knitting Co sweatpants
description:
A pair of cotton jersey sweatpants from Core RD Knitting Co. Elastic waistband with drawstrings, slightly lowered crotch, side pockets and small slits at the bottom of the legs. 
100% organic cotton

title: Core RD Knitting Co trousers
description:
A pair of suit trousers from Core RD Knitting Co. A narrow leg in a cropped fit featuring a detachable knitted strap which adds a bit to the style. Front and back pleats and side pockets plus buttoned welt pockets in the back. 
Main: 53% recycled polyester 43% wool 4% elastane

0-XXS-(44)1-XS-(46)2-S-(48)3-M-(50)4-L-(52)5-XL-(54)6-XXL-(56)

title: Core RD Knitting Co kimono
description:
A kimono style wrap cardigan in cotton jersey from Core RD Knitting Co. This kimono can be worn in many different ways thanks to its different straps and ties sewn in to it. Keep it open or wrap it tight. Fold up the sleeves or keep them long and loose. 
100% organic cotton

title: Core RD Knitting Co vest
description:
A straight fit vest from Core RD Knitting Co. Single breast button closure and welt pocket in the front. A detachable pouch on the front that can be replaced as well on the front. 
Main: 53% recycled polyester 43% wool 4% elastaneLining: 100% Polyester

title: Core RD Knitting Co tank top
description:
A classic fit rib knitted cotton tank top from Core RD Knitting Co. A signature red seem at the bottom left corner. 
95% cotton 5% elastane

title: Core RD Knitting Co
description:
A fine merino wool single breasted cardigan from Core RD Knitting Co. The yarn is made of the finest merino wool spun in Italy which gives this garment a soft and smooth texture and feel to it. 
100% Merino Wool

title: Core RD Knitting Co sweater
description:
A straight fit slightly cropped boat neck sweater from Core RD Kitting Co. Made from finest Merino Wool spun in Italy which gives this garment a soft and smooth texture and feel to it. 
100% Merino Wool

title: Core RD Knitting Co blazer
description:
A classic fit blazer from Core RD Knitting Co with a two button single breasted closure in the front. Welt breast pocket and welted flap pockets in the front. A detachable pocket in the back plus a detachable knitted strap is featured in this style which gives you many options as how to wear this garment. 
Main: 53% recycled polyester 43% wool 4% elastaneLining: 100% polyester

title: Core RD Knitting Co vest
description:
A vest from Core RD Knitting Co cut to a straight fit with single button closure in the front. Welt pockets in the front and a detachable pocket in the back plus a detachable knitted strap are fun details added to this garment which gives you many different ways to style it. Adjustable waist.
Main: 53% recycled polyester 43% wool 4% elastaneLining: 100% Polyester

title: Ewa Larsson shirt
description:
Handcrafted Silk Shirt
Each Garment tells its own story and is one of a kind. Vintage silk scarfs found all over the world are carefully chosen and sewn together in an atelier in Stockholm to create a vibrant patchwork for each unique, eclectic piece.
As the garments are crafted of vintage materials no item is the other one alike and colour variations will occur.
One Size

title: Dries Van Noten shirt
description:
A classic tailored dress shirt from Dries Van Noten. This shirt in black cotton poplin is cut to a tailored fit and can be worn together with suits or as a casual garment. classic collar and cuffs. Button closure in the front. 
232-020704-7323-900100% CottonMade in Hungary

title: Stockholm (Surfboard) Club trousers
description:
Straight wide fit trousers from Stockholm (Surfboard) Club. A fun spin on the classic 60's silhouette. These trousers are made in a smooth polyester fabric. Two front pockets and two back pockets. A small logo patch sewn into the waistband in the back. 
100% Polyester

title: imaskopi handknitted sweater
description:
Hand knitted one of a kind IMASKOPI oversized sweater in a soft alpaca and silk blend. These garments are carefully hand crafted in their atelier in Stockholm and features a light and airy feel and texture. Featuring a sewn on patch which can be removed.
All IMASKOPI's garments are unique and exists only in one piece of each. Their one size system works for most people between sizes XS-XL but may vary depending on the style.
Care instructions: Hand wash in cold water, no warmer than 30°C, with a wool detergent. Do not soak. Dry and store flat.  
77% Alpaca 23% SilkMade in Sweden

All IMASKOPI's garments are unique and exists only in one piece of each. Their one size system works for most people between sizes XS-XL but may vary depending on the style.
Care instructions: Hand wash in cold water, no warmer than 30°C, with a wool detergent. Do not soak. Dry and store flat.  
90% Kid mohair 10% MicrofibreMade in Sweden

title: James Perse t-shirt
description:

100% Cotton

title: James Perse shirt
description:
James Perse Standard Shirt is made in 100% cotton that is lightweight and breathable. This fabric is designed using delicate, high count yarns, resulting in a crisp, smooth feel. Style details include a shirt collar, button front closure, full length sleeves with placket at cuffs, back locker loop at neck and a shirttail hem. Garment dyed with extra softeners and silicone for a soft, lived in feel. Classic fit.100% Cotton
Made in China
